newsitem.title: BELGIUM: Belgian bond exchange auction totals 15.25 bln Bfr.
newsitem.headline: Belgian bond exchange auction totals 15.25 bln Bfr.

text.p: The Belgian Treasury's bond exchange auction totalled 15.25 billion francs, the Treasury said in a statement.

At the auction, participants could exchange the OLO lines 11 (9.00 pct, July 1998), 25 (5.00 pct, March 2001), 6 (9.00 pct, March 2003) and 26 (6.25 pct, March 2007) against 15 (6.75 pct, May 1997) and 8 (9.25 pct, Aug 1997).
